name: Good Form
description:
When you roll Engagement, you can always re-roll one die before resolving, and can re-roll additional dice for 1 MP each.

Whenever you roll the highest possible number on an Engagement die, you may spend it as if it were a Success.

improvements.name: Excellent Form
improvements.description: You can always re-roll 2 Engagement dice at no cost.

improvements.name: Backfoot Them
improvements.description: Each time you win an Engagement, the foe's Defense is lowered by 1.

improvements.name: Dominate
improvements.description: If you win 3 Engagements in a row against the same foe, your next attack against them automatically inflicts Injury on a hit.
